topic.title: ZeroNet and big sites
topic.body: How exactly does this service work with big sites. Say I wanted to create zerotube, obviously you can't expect every user to seed every video. Even without video content, it can quickly become too much for a single user to host. But as far as I see, everything is hosted on every single peer.

1_1BzUT9qFow1JG6GGk1cHiBHPq4qTyXwys4.body: Ah that makes sense. Hopefully it gets added in the future.

1_1MEWJRMLgvofqG9Mbsb2Rc4hFFyv7HeRx7.body: Sites are limited of how much they can take up of your space and you can delete them if you want.
